CustomField.description: When checked, all payment method in Gift Processing Setting CMT will adhere to the method selected (just like in the case of outright gift, for example). Payment method of Legacy will allow non-gift amount to pay down the pledge. If unchecked, use current approach, which is don't apply non gift amount to payment when making a pledge payment.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: When checked, all payment method in Gift Processing Setting CMT will adhere to the method selected (just like in the case of outright gift, for example). Payment method of Legacy will allow non-gift amount to pay down the pledge. If unchecked, use current approach, which is don't apply non gift amount to payment when making a pledge payment.
CustomField.label: Allow Non Gift Amount to Pay Installment
